entry.title: cs229_note_3
entry.content: \[求解高斯判别分析模型GDA中协方差矩阵\sum:\sum= \frac{1}{m}\sum_{i=1}^{m}{(x^{(i)}-\mu_{y^{(i)}})(x^{(i)}-\mu_{y^{(i)}})^T}\] \[(m数据行数, y\sim Bernoulli(\phi), x|y=0\sim N(\mu_0,\sum), x|y=1\sim N(\mu_1,\sum))\] \[1) 先证明\frac{\partial a^TX^{-1}b}{\partial X} = -X^{-T}ab^TX^{-T}\] \[\because XX^{-1} = E\] \[\therefore 两边微分: dXX^{-1} + XdX^{-1} = dE\] \[\therefore dX^{-1} = -X^{-1}dXX^{-1}\] \[\therefore d(a^TX^{-1}b) = a^TdX^{-1}b = -a^TX^{-1}dXX^{-1}b = tr(-X^{-1}ba^TX^{-1}dX)\] \[\because 根据全微分: df = \sum\frac{\partial f}{\partial x_i}dx_i = tr(\frac{\partial f}{\partial X}^TdX)\] \[\therefore d(a^TX^{-1}b) = tr(\frac{\partial a^TX^{-1}b}{\partial X}^TdX)\] \[\therefore \frac{\partial a^TX^{-1}b}{\partial X} = -X^{-T}ab^TX^{-T}\] \[2)再证明 \frac{\partial log|X|}{\partial X} = X^{-T}\] \[\because 根据Laplace展开 d|X| = tr(X^*dX)\] \[\therefore dlog|X| = \frac{1}{|X|}d|X| = \frac{1}{|X|}tr(X^*dX) = tr(X^{-1}dX)\] \[\therefore \frac{\partial log|X|}{\partial X} = X^{-T}\] \[3)对高斯判别模型: \frac{\partial l(\phi, \mu_0, \mu_1, \sum)}{\partial \sum} = \frac{\partial \sum_{i=1}^m(-\frac{1}{2}log|\sum| - \frac{1}{2}(x^{(i)}-\mu_{y^{(i)}})^T\sum^{-1}(x^{(i)}-\mu_{y^{(i)}}) + f(\phi, \mu_0, \mu_1))}{\partial \sum}\] \[ = \sum_{i=1}^m{(-\frac{1}{2}\sum{^{-T}} + \frac{1}{2}\sum{^{-T}}(x^{(i)}-\mu_{y^{(i)}})(x^{(i)}-\mu_{y^{(i)}})^T\sum{^{-T}} + 0)}\] \[\because \frac{\partial l(\phi, \mu_0, \mu_1, \sum)}{\partial \sum} = 0\] \[\therefore \sum = \frac{1}{m}\sum_{i=1}^m{((x^{(i)}-\mu_{y^{(i)}})(x^{(i)}-\mu_{y^{(i)}})^T)}\]

entry.content:
证明: \[
abla_AtrABA^TC = CAB + C^TAB^T\] \[(A_{m*n}, B_{n*n}, C_{m*m})\] \[ ecause trABA^TC\] \[ = \sum_{i=1}^m(ABA^TC)_{ii} \] \[ = \sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{j=1}^n(AB)_{ij}(A^TC)_{ji} \] \[ = \sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{j=1}^n(\sum_{k=1}^nA_{ik}B_{kj})(\sum_{l=1}^mA^T_{jl}C_{li}) \] \[ = \sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{j=1}^n\sum_{k=1}^n\sum_{l=1}^mA_{ik}B_{kj}A^T_{jl}C_{li} \] \[ = \sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{j=1}^n\sum_{k=1}^n\sum_{l=1}^mA_{ik}A_{lj}B_{kj}C_{li}\] \[	herefore (
abla_AtrABA^TC)_{pq} \] \[=  rac{\partial trABA^TC}{\partial A_{pq}} \] \[=  rac{\partial}{\partial A_{pq}}\sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{j=1}^n\sum_{k=1}^n\sum_{l=1}^mA_{ik}A_{lj}B_{kj}C_{li} \] \[= \sum_{j=1}^n\sum_{l=1}^mA_{lj}B_{qj}C_{lp} + \sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{k=1}^nA_{ik}B_{kq}C_{pi} \] \[= \sum_{j=1}^n\sum_{l=1}^mC^T_{pl}A_{lj}B^T_{jq} + \sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{k=1}^nC_{pi}A_{ik}B_{kq} \] \[=\sum_{j=1}^n(C^TA)_{pj}B^T_{jq} + \sum_{i=1}^mC_{pi}(AB)_{iq}\] \[=(C^TAB^T)_{pq} + (CAB)_{pq}\] \[	herefore 
abla_AtrABA^TC = CAB + C^TAB^T\]
